boxed-text.label: Box 1 Epidemic information of COVID-19
boxed-text.p: As of May 8, 2020, there are 1,654,345 confirmed cases and 152,179 deaths in the European region; 1,586,129 confirmed cases and 87,930 deaths in the region of the Americas; 237,323 confirmed cases and 8608 deaths in the Eastern Mediterranean region; 157,447 confirmed cases and 6394 deaths in the Western Pacific region; 86,294 confirmed cases and 3075 deaths in the South-East Asia region; 33,973 confirmed cases and 1202 deaths in the Africa region.
